mapper.select:
select
from bu_promotion where delflag = '1' and promotion_status = '1'
and add_time <= current_timestamp()
order by sort_num;
select count(*) from (SELECT count(*) FROM interaction.bu_order where order_status in (1,2,3) group by user_id) as a
